Bernie Sanders ( I-VT) telling Fox News host Neil Cavuto , I think it is not a good idea for us as a nation to try to frighten people and say, ''Social Security is not going to be there for you. Social Security is going bankrupt,' which is obviously not the case. Co-host Steve Doocy responded by saying, ''Oh, really?'' Iraq has been worth the cost and remains largely unapologetic about his handling of the conflict, The Washington Post reported on Wednesday. Had the government of Saddam Hussein remained in power the Middle East would be far more perilous than it is today, Donald Rumsfeld wrote in his 800-page memoir, scheduled for release on Tuesday.
